A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a long time Star Wars fan I found the Last Jedi to be a thrillingly entertaining film that brings a fresh edge to the franchise\, boldly taking it in a new and exciting direction. The chemistry between key characters is nothing short of scintillating. The battles are epic and the lightsaber duels are kick-ass. From what I can tell the haters dissing the film are simply disappointed that their theories they imagined before its release out have fallen flat - instead the film takes unpredictable twists and turns\, elevating it beyond The Force Awakens and setting up for a promising 9th episode in a couple of years time.
